title: New League Client
body: Every time I try to download the new client it says an error has occurred and I need to re download it. I'm not sure what the error is, anyone have any ideas or any sort of help for this please?

replies.body: If you're transitioning from the legacy to updated client but receiving that error, then an unstable connection might be cutting you off.  Run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that your network is strong enough to download the updates without getting cut off.  Let me know if you have any questions!
My parents did put on a parental controls onto my computer could that be stopping it?
